trans-unit.source: If set to false, bodyB will be free to rotate around its anchor point.

trans-unit.source: If set to true it will add the overflow='hidden' style to the parent DOM element.

trans-unit.target: 如果此属性和 autoCull 属性都设置为 true ，那么 kill 方法

trans-unit.source: If this body is using a Circle shape this controls the radius.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个主体使用的是Circle形状,则控制半径。

trans-unit.source: If this body is using a Tile shape, you can set the Tile id here, i.e. Phaser.Physics.Ninja.Tile.SLOPE_45DEGpn, Phaser.Physics.Ninja.Tile.CONVEXpp, etc.

trans-unit.source: If this frame was trimmed or not.

trans-unit.source: If this object is fixedToCamera then this stores the x/y position offset relative to the top-left of the camera view.

trans-unit.source: If this property is true then the children will not be considered as valid for Input events.

trans-unit.source: If this tween has more than one child this allows you to target a specific child. If set to -1 it will set the delay on all the children.

trans-unit.source: If this tween has more than one child this allows you to target a specific child. If set to -1 it will set the easing function on all children.

trans-unit.source: If this tween has more than one child this allows you to target a specific child. If set to -1 it will set the interpolation function on all children.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个tween有一个以上的子代,这允许你针对特定的子代。如果设置为-1,则会对所有子代设置插值功能。

trans-unit.source: If this tween has more than one child this allows you to target a specific child. If set to -1 it will set the repeat value on all the children.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个tween有一个以上的孩子,这可以让你瞄准一个特定的孩子。如果设置为-1,则会对所有子代设置重复值。

trans-unit.source: If this tween has more than one child this allows you to target a specific child. If set to -1 it will set the repeatDelay on all the children.

trans-unit.source: If this tween has more than one child this allows you to target a specific child. If set to -1 it will set the yoyoDelay on all the children.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个tween有一个以上的孩子,这可以让你锁定一个特定的孩子,如果设置为-1,则会对所有的孩子设置yoyoDelay。如果设置为-1,则会对所有的孩子设置yoyoDelay。

trans-unit.source: If this tween has more than one child this allows you to target a specific child. If set to -1 it will set yoyo on all the children.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个tween有一个以上的孩子,这可以让你瞄准一个特定的孩子。如果设置为-1,则会对所有的孩子设置yoyo。

trans-unit.source: If true (the default) then parallel downloading will be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true(默认),则将启用并行下载。

trans-unit.source: If true destroy will be invoked on each removed child.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则将在每个删除的子代上调用 destroy 。

trans-unit.source: If true destroy will be invoked on the removed child.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则将对已移除的子代调用 destroy 。

trans-unit.source: If true Pointer.stop will be called if the mouse leaves the game canvas.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,如果鼠标离开游戏画布,Pointer.stop将被调用。

trans-unit.source: If true World.separate will always separate on the X axis before Y. Otherwise it will check gravity totals first.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,World.separate将始终在X轴上先于Y轴分离,否则将先检查重力总计。

trans-unit.source: If true adjacent colliding tiles will be combined into a single body to save processing. However it means you cannot perform specific Tile to Body collision responses.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,相邻的碰撞瓷砖将被合并成一个主体以节省处理。但这意味着您不能执行特定的瓷砖到主体碰撞响应。

trans-unit.source: If true after the animation stops the currentFrame value will be set to the first frame in this animation.
trans-unit.target: 如果在动画停止后为真,currentFrame的值将被设置为这个动画的第一帧。

trans-unit.source: If true all Sprites created by, or added to this group, will have a physics body enabled on them.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,所有由该组创建或添加到该组的Sprites都将启用物理体。

trans-unit.source: If true all Sprites created with #create or #createMulitple will have a physics body created on them. Change the body type with #physicsBodyType.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,所有用#create或#createMulitple创建的Sprites都会有一个物理体。使用#physicsBodyType改变主体类型。

trans-unit.source: If true all Sprites created with Group.create or Group.createMulitple will have a physics body created on them. Change the body type with physicsBodyType.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则使用 Group.create 或 Group.createMulitple 创建的所有Sprite 都将在其上创建物理实体。使用physicsBodyType更改身体类型。

trans-unit.source: If true all Static objects will be removed from the results array.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,所有静态对象将从结果数组中移除。

trans-unit.source: If true all calls to Loader.reset will be ignored. Useful if you need to create a load queue before swapping to a preloader state.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,所有对Loader.reset的调用将被忽略。如果你需要在切换到预加载器状态之前创建一个加载队列,那么这个选项很有用。

trans-unit.source: If true all the events in Timer will be cleared, otherwise they will remain.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,定时器中的所有事件将被清除,否则它们将保持不变。

trans-unit.source: If true and if the browser supports XDomainRequest, it will be used in preference for XHR.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,并且如果浏览器支持XDomainRequest,将优先使用XHR。

trans-unit.source: If true and you collide this Sprite against a Group, it will disable the collision check from using a QuadTree.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,并且你将这个Sprite碰撞到一个Group,它将禁用使用QuadTree的碰撞检查。

trans-unit.source: If true getTile won't return null for empty tiles, but a Tile object with an index of -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果getTile为真,对于空的瓷砖不会返回null,而是返回一个索引为-1的Tile对象。

trans-unit.source: If true it will automatically add each body to the world, otherwise it's up to you to do so.
trans-unit.target: 如果是真的,它会自动将每个身体添加到世界上,否则就得靠你自己去做。

trans-unit.source: If true it will automatically add each body to the world.
trans-unit.target: 如果是真的,它将自动把每个身体添加到世界上。

trans-unit.source: If true it will check for segment intersection, otherwise full line intersection.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,将检查段交,否则为全线交。

trans-unit.source: If true it will enable collision on the tile. If false it will clear collision values from the tile.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,将启用瓷砖上的碰撞。如果为假,则会清除瓷砖上的碰撞值。

trans-unit.source: If true it will enable collision. If false it will clear collision.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,则启用碰撞。如果为假,则清除碰撞。

trans-unit.source: If true it will put the recalculation on hold.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,则会暂停重新计算。

trans-unit.source: If true it will scan the layer in reverse, starting at the bottom-right. Otherwise it scans from the top-left.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,它将从右下角开始反向扫描图层。否则它将从左上角开始扫描。

trans-unit.source: If true it will use a pixel perfect test to see if you clicked the Sprite. False uses the bounding box.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,它将使用像素完美测试,看看你是否点击了Sprite。如果为假,则使用边界框。

trans-unit.source: If true it will use startSprite.center.x, if false startSprite.x. Note that Sprites don't have a center property by default, so only enable if you've over-ridden your Sprite with a custom class.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,它将使用startSprite.center.x,如果为假,则使用startSprite.x。请注意,Sprite默认没有中心属性,所以只有当你用自定义类覆盖了你的Sprite时才启用。

trans-unit.source: If true the Body will check itself against the Sprite.getBounds() dimensions and adjust its width and height accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,Body将根据Sprite.getBounds()的尺寸检查自身,并相应地调整其宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: If true the Bounds will be set to use its own Collision Group.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,Bounds将被设置为使用自己的Collision Group。

trans-unit.source: If true the DOM mouse events will have event.preventDefault applied to them, if false they will propagate fully.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,DOM鼠标事件将应用event.preventDefault,如果为假,它们将完全传播。

trans-unit.source: If true the Pointer events will have event.preventDefault applied to them, if false they will propagate fully.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,指针事件将被应用到event.preventDefault,如果为假,它们将完全传播。

trans-unit.source: If true the QuadTree will not be used for any collision. QuadTrees are great if objects are well spread out in your game, otherwise they are a performance hit. If you enable this you can disable on a per body basis via Body.skipQuadTree.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则QuadTree将不会用于任何碰撞。如果对象在游戏中分布良好，则QuadTree非常有用，否则会降低性能。如果启用此功能，则可以通过 Body.skipQuadTree 逐个禁用。

trans-unit.source: If true the Sprite will be bought to the top of the rendering list in its current Group.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,该Sprite将被购买到当前Group中渲染列表的顶部。

trans-unit.source: If true the Sprite will show the hand cursor on mouse-over (doesn't apply to mobile browsers)
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,Sprite将在鼠标移动时显示手部光标(不适用于移动浏览器)。

trans-unit.source: If true the State will be started immediately after adding it.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,国家将在添加后立即启动。

trans-unit.source: If true the TilingSprite will run generateTexture on its next render pass.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则TilingSprite将在其下一个渲染过程中运行generateTexture 。

trans-unit.source: If true the TouchEvent will have prevent.default called on it.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,TouchEvent将被调用prevent.default。

trans-unit.source: If true the browser will issue a redirect to the url with the new querystring.
trans-unit.target: 如果为真,浏览器将发出一个重定向到新的查询字符串的url。

trans-unit.source: If true the child will not dispatch the onAddedToGroup event.
trans-unit.target: 如果为true，则子级将不会调度 onAddedToGroup 事件。

trans-unit.source: It adjusts the measurements such that it is possible to detect when an element is near the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 它调整测量值,使其能够检测到元素何时靠近视口。

trans-unit.source: It allows for AABB and Circle to Tile collision. Tiles can be any of 34 different types, including slopes, convex and concave shapes.
trans-unit.target: 它允许AABB和Circle to Tile碰撞。瓷砖可以是34种不同类型中的任何一种,包括斜面、凸面和凹面形状。

trans-unit.source: It allows you to display animated Game Objects that were created with the Creature Automated Animation Tool.
trans-unit.target: 它允许您显示使用Creature Automated Animation Tool创建的动画游戏对象。

trans-unit.source: It allows you to prevent a parent from scaling this Game Object higher than the given value.
trans-unit.target: 它允许你阻止父体将此游戏对象的缩放比例高于给定值。

trans-unit.source: It allows you to prevent a parent from scaling this Game Object lower than the given value.
trans-unit.target: 它允许你阻止父体将此游戏对象的缩放比例低于给定值。

trans-unit.source: It also adds a single mouseup listener to window which is used to capture the mouse being released
trans-unit.target: 它还将单个 mouseup 侦听器添加到 window ，用于捕获正在释放的鼠标

trans-unit.source: It also enables them for collision checks again.
trans-unit.target: 这也使他们能够再次进行碰撞检查。

trans-unit.source: It also handles browser visibility handling and the pausing due to loss of focus.
trans-unit.target: 它还处理了浏览器的可见性处理和因失去焦点而暂停的问题。

trans-unit.source: It also happens mid-step. So do not destroy a Body during this callback, instead set safeDestroy to true so it will be killed on the next preUpdate.
trans-unit.target: 它也会发生在步骤中间。所以在这个回调过程中不要销毁一个Body,而是将safeDestroy设置为true,这样它就会在下一次preUpdate时被杀死。

trans-unit.source: It also has callbacks swapped for Signals and a few issues patched with regard to properties and completion errors.
trans-unit.target: 它还将回调换成了Signals,并修补了一些关于属性和完成错误的问题。

trans-unit.source: It also optionally kills the Game Object if outOfBoundsKill is true.
trans-unit.target: 如果 outOfBoundsKill 为 true ,它还可以选择终止游戏对象。

trans-unit.source: It also overrides the x and y properties, ensuring that any manual adjustment of them is reflected in the physics body itself.
trans-unit.target: 它还覆盖了x和y属性,确保对它们的任何手动调整都会反映在物理体本身。

trans-unit.source: It also stops them being able to be checked for collision.
trans-unit.target: 这也阻止了他们能够被检查碰撞。

trans-unit.source: It also toggles the visible property to false as well.
trans-unit.target: 它还将 visible 属性也切换为false。

trans-unit.source: It can also be an instance of a RenderTexture, BitmapData, Video or PIXI.Texture.
trans-unit.target: 它也可以是RenderTexture、BitmapData、Video或PIXI.Texture的实例。

trans-unit.source: It can be for any of the physics systems that have been started:
trans-unit.target: 它可以为任何一个已经启动的物理系统。

trans-unit.source: It can be re-assigned to either LINEAR or NEAREST, depending upon suitability.
trans-unit.target: 根据合适的情况,它可以被重新分配到LINEAR或NEAREST。

trans-unit.source: It can be used for one-time explosions or for continuous effects like rain and fire.
trans-unit.target: 可用于一次性爆炸,也可用于雨、火等连续效果。

trans-unit.source: It can be used in combination with the damage method or modified directly.
trans-unit.target: 它可以与 damage 方法结合使用或直接修改。

trans-unit.source: It can still rotate, scale, crop and receive input events.
trans-unit.target: 它仍然可以旋转、缩放、裁剪和接收输入事件。

trans-unit.source: It can still rotate, scale, crop and receive input events. This makes it perfect for logos, backgrounds, simple buttons and other non-Sprite graphics.
trans-unit.target: 它仍然可以旋转、缩放、裁剪和接收输入事件。这使得它非常适合用于标识、背景、简单按钮和其他非Sprite图形。

trans-unit.source: It captures and processes mouse events that happen on the game canvas object.
trans-unit.target: 它捕捉并处理发生在游戏画布对象上的鼠标事件。

trans-unit.source: It compares the alpha value of the pixel and if >= InputHandler.pixelPerfectAlpha it returns true.
trans-unit.target: 它比较像素的alpha值，如果> = InputHandler.pixelPerfectAlpha，则返回true。

trans-unit.source: It consists of a delay, which is a value in milliseconds after which the event will fire.
trans-unit.target: 它由延迟组成,延迟是一个以毫秒为单位的值,在这个值之后,事件将被触发。

trans-unit.source: It does what it does very well, but is ripe for expansion and optimisation. Here are some features that I'd love to see the community add:
trans-unit.target: 它做得很好,但扩展和优化的时机已经成熟。以下是我希望看到社区增加的一些功能。

trans-unit.source: It has the property that a cursor is passively moved without activating the input.
trans-unit.target: 它的属性是在不激活输入的情况下被动移动光标。

trans-unit.source: It ignores delay and repeat counts and any chained tweens, but does include child tweens.
trans-unit.target: 它忽略了延迟和重复计数以及任何链式微调,但确实包括儿童微调。

trans-unit.source: It is automatically decremented by the millisecond equivalent of game.time.physicsElapsed each frame.
trans-unit.target: 每帧经过的 game.time.physicsElapsed 毫秒等效值会自动将其递减。

trans-unit.source: It is called BEFORE Stage, Tweens, Sounds, Input, Physics, Particles and Plugins have had their postUpdate methods called.
trans-unit.target: 它被称为BEFORE Stage,Tweens,Sounds,Input,Physics,Particles和Plugins都有它们的postUpdate方法。

trans-unit.source: It is called during the core game loop AFTER debug, physics, plugins and the Stage have had their preUpdate methods called.
trans-unit.target: 它是在核心游戏循环中,在调试、物理、插件和舞台的preUpdate方法被调用之后被调用的。

trans-unit.source: It is called immediately after preUpdate and before postUpdate.
trans-unit.target: 在 preUpdate 之后和 postUpdate 之前立即调用它。

trans-unit.source: It is created by the AnimationManager, consists of Animation.Frame objects and belongs to a single Game Object such as a Sprite.
trans-unit.target: 它由AnimationManager创建,由Animation.Frame对象组成,属于单个游戏对象,如Sprite。

trans-unit.source: It is derived by calling getBounds, calculating the Groups dimensions based on its
trans-unit.target: 它是通过调用 getBounds 派生的，并基于其计算Groups维度

trans-unit.source: It is dispatched only when the new state is started, which isn't usually at the same time as StateManager.start
trans-unit.target: 只有当新的状态被启动时,才会被派发,这通常不是与StateManager.start同时进行的。

trans-unit.source: It is expected that your callback will deal with endianess. If you'd rather Phaser did it then use processPixelRGB instead.
trans-unit.target: 我们希望你的回调能够处理无痕。如果你想让Phaser来处理,那就用processPixelRGB来代替。

trans-unit.source: It is important to note that the transform is not updated when you call this method.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,当你调用这个方法时,变换不会被更新。

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to instantiate the Device class manually.
